Package solver

Class SolverHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.SolverHandler

  • public class SolverHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that takes care of the running of the solver.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SolverHandler

        public SolverHandler​(java.lang.String solverPath,
                     java.lang.String solverName,
                     java.lang.String filePath,
                     java.lang.String fileName)
        The full constructor with all parameters that is is typically only called by the empty constructor in this class.
        Parameters:
        solverPath - the path where the solver (mathsat) is to find
        solverName - the name of the solver to exec
        filePath - the path where the SMT2 file should be saved
        fileName - the name of the file to save as

      • SolverHandler

        public SolverHandler​()
        Empty constructor with default values from config file.

    • Method Detail

      • runSolver

        public boolean runSolver​(java.lang.String buffer,
                         Property property)
        Method that runs the solver on the content of a string.
        Parameters:
        buffer - the string containing valid SMT lines
        property - the property that is verified by this run
        Returns:
        true, if successful
